title: Teemoing Icon
body: So I played around 30 games of Teemoing and The Gaunlet, but I STILL haven't gotten my icon and now I'm wondering if Riot forgot about me?

replies.body: We certainly didn't forget about you! We're still granting these icons until *Nov. 17th.* If you don't have it by then, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help you out.
